summary: A romantic comedy centered on a gentile who pretends to be Jewish in order to win the affection of his love interest.
cast: Austin Abrams|Tom Arnold|Brennan Bailey|Wilmer Calderon|Joe Childs|Cheryl Daro|Cheryl David|Neil Dickson|Conor Dubin|Tom Fitzpatrick|Brian Fong|Rachel G. Fox|Joseph S. Griffo|Jennifer Love Hewitt|Christine Lakin|Jon Lovitz|Hayes MacArthur|Wendie Malick|Camryn Manheim|Rolando Molina|Joel David Moore|Nick Plantico|Crystal Reed|Phil Rosenthal|Ivan Sergei|Lin Shaye|Nicollette Sheridan|Jamie-Lynn Sigler|Peter Stormare|Elaine Tan|Robert Towers|Bree Turner|Sharon Wilkins|Rita Wilson|Karen Yum|Chad Evans|Christopher Carrington|Rico Devereaux|Rawleigh Grove|Dominique Grund|Jacque Lawson|Mark Sande|Brett Walkow|Mark Anthony Williams
title: Una novia muy especial
